Andre is willing to accept Cinta to work at his cafe on the condition that Cinta must create a coffee recipe that many people like so that Andre's cafe is famous.

programme.title: Miss Amis Tapi Manis Bikin Cintaku Ngga Abis-Abis
programme.desc: Famous artist Raisa finds herself inheriting a fish pond, sparking family conflict, betrayal, and a struggle to manage the family legacy. With Tama's support, Raisa faces increasingly complex challenges, while Melati creates intrigues for her own personal gain.

programme.title: BINTANG PANTURA 5 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Pantura Bintang Stage is back looking for Bintang. Excitement, cuteness, rocking each other to become a star.

programme.title: JUARA INDONESIA - EP 21
programme.desc: A quiz show where children test their knowledge and dexterity in answering questions quickly and accurately.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 17 - EP 2
programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: 33 Hari Aku Terjebak Rekayasa Cintamu
programme.desc: Raisa was originally going to marry Bayu, but ran away after finding out that Bayu had reported Hari to the police. Raisa and Hari met again. At first, Hari approached her with the intention of taking revenge on Bayu, but eventually they fell in love with each other.

programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 116
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Cinta Babe Angels Ber 33
programme.desc: Babe, a widower who lost his wife ten years ago, is worried because his three daughters still don't have partners. Conflicts of love and family arise, including jealousy, hurt feelings, and sacrifice. What is the story like?

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 454
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 128
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: DITIKUNG TEMEN DI KEBUN TEH
programme.desc: Timo plans to return to his hometown to forget Jessica. However, Didit disagrees and asks Timo to calm down at Didit's parents' house, one of the herbal tea distributors in the market. While Timo was heading to the market carrying some herbal tea, he was hit by Incess or Intan, a woman dressed in flashy clothes and heavy makeup, causing Timo's herbal tea to spill onto the road. What made Timo angry was that after that, Incess just ran away.

programme.title: JOZAN - EP 2

programme.title: Megat Extend - EP 3
programme.desc: Kisah komedi kehidupan di kampus sekumpulan pelajar yang tinggal bersama-sama di rumah milik senior mereka, Megat, pelajar senior yang 'in denial' dan tidak mahu untuk meninggalkan kehidupan kampus.

programme.title: Lawak Tak Lagha S2 - EP 1

programme.title: Punchline - EP 15
programme.desc: Lebih meriah, lebih kecoh! Saksikan program variasi yang menampilkan Dato' AC Mizal beraksi bersama PS Mansur dan tetamu jemputan yang bakal membuat anda tidak kering gusi!

programme.title: Sketso - EP 7
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan sketsa komedi tentang pencegahan kemalangan untuk pekerja di bawa khas oleh Pertubuhan Keselamatan Pekerja Sosial (PERKESO).

programme.title: Akak Akak Sangat - EP 9
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara mengenai topik- topik hangat yang akan diperbincangkan dalam keadaan yang kasual.

programme.title: Muka Buku - EP 13

programme.title: Bujang 40 - EP 3
programme.desc: Bujang, 40 tahun, sepanjang hidupnya sudah beberapa kali dia gagal bercinta. Kegagalan ini antara lain disebabkan sikap ibunya yang terlalu mengongkong hidupnya. Ini membuatkan Bujang mengambil keputusan untuk terus membujang

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 5
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2019 - EP 9
programme.desc: Merupakan sebuah rancangan Sitkom komedi pertama yang disiarkan secara langsung. Menampilkan 4 orang pelakon komedi tetap dan diserikan dengan tetamu jemputan.

programme.title: 3 dara kg.com - EP 8
programme.desc: Esah, Awa dan Noi, tiga dara pingitan yang berkawan baik meski berbeza personaliti. Mereka berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja dan secara tak sengaja bertemu Kak Lala, seorang tauke jamu terkenal

programme.title: Motif Sosial? - EP 7
programme.desc: Kesinambungan Motif Viral, kali ini melalui eksperimen sosial yang viral dengan penampilan selebriti undangan.

programme.title: Kiah The Spy - EP 3
programme.desc: Kiah membina kumpulan baru untuk menguruskan perniagaan Ikan Pekasamnya,dia juga dilatih dan dilantik menjadi seorang ejen rahsia.

programme.title: Gado Gado 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Siri komedi popular 90an, Gado Gado kini kembali dengan nafas baru dengan mengembalikan konsep komedi sketsa dan satira yang mempunyai pendekatan seperti slot television asli, iklan, telemovie, drama siri dan juga dokumentari.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong? S4 - EP 4
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.title: Lawak Ke Der Tak Coverline - EP 4

programme.desc: Laila terkenal di kampungnya berkat vlog yang dimuatnya, sehingga orang di kampung memanggilnya dengan nama Nikita.

programme.title: Cik Bunga Encik Sombong - EP 6
programme.desc: Tidak semena-mena Intan Asnidar yang menghantar bunga menjadi tunangan Harris Isqandar apabila gadis yang sepatutnya menjadi tunangannya melarikan diri. Apakah kesudahannya?

programme.title: Sorry, Sengaja! - EP 3

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar - EP 15

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat - EP 4

programme.title: Meja Panggang - EP 6

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Nandhini
programme.desc: Nandini is a supernatural drama series. The story is about a rich influential family haunted by a snake's curse and how a good spirit helps the family from the snake by its supernatural powers.

programme.title: Poongodi
programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI
programme.desc: When her husband, a soldier, disappears in a military accident, Vinothini never loses hope, firmly believing he'll come back. Join her inspiring journey as she cares for his family & meets life's hardships as a single mother with resilience & love

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie- SUNDARA TRAVELS

programme.title: Movie contd - SUNDARA TRAVELS

programme.title: Anuman

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 7
programme.desc: Antoine's announcement creates tensions. Seeing that her reaction disappoints Laurence, Juliette takes things in hand and tries to turn the situation around. Donald says too much and has to move out.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 19
programme.desc: Ronon Le Corre has been a shellfish picker for the last twenty years, gathering one particular species in the Audierne and Douarnenez Bays: tellines. But in recent years it has become increasingly rare. Plankton, its main source of food, is directly affected by the polluted water released into the sea.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 48
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 44
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 5
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 22
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 9
programme.desc: A little mouse returns from a walk and tells her mother that she has made a new friend. But the little mouse is cross: a cock had chased her friend away. And yet, maybe the cock had actually saved her life... her new friend was none other than a cat.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 10
programme.desc: Little Ahiwa lost her mother when she was very young. Her father re-married, but the step-mother was very unkind to little Ahiwa. Despite her suffering, Ahiwa managed to carry on smiling. Her step-mother is furious, and determined to make Ahiwa's life as difficult as possible.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 15
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Monsieur La Souris
programme.desc: Mr. La Souris, a kind vagabond with good manners, opens the doors in front of a nightclub. One evening, a car arrives containing a body. La Souris picks up the dead man's wallet. When he becomes a police suspect in the murder enquiry, he decides to carry out his own investigation.

programme.title: Maestro
programme.desc: By moonlight, in the depths of a forest, a choir of wild animals conducted by a squirrel perform a piece from a Bellini opera.

programme.title: Donovan S'evade
programme.desc: Donovan, a bodyguard, is given the job of protecting the wife of a government minister, on holiday with friends. In doing so the young man discovers a life to which he has never been entitled.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 7
programme.desc: Both for her health and that of her baby, Irene has to do as little as possible. She continues to work on her files, whilst Paule replaces her in court. Meanwhile, Nadia draws Paule's attention to one particular case: a teenager suspected of having served as bait for a murder.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 8
programme.desc: The law firm is in financial difficulties. Irene counts on Paule's cooperation. Even though she could go into labour at any moment, Irene has no choice but to assist her on the case involving her aunt Suzanne, suspected of having poisoned a wealthy man to misappropriate his goods.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 2
programme.desc: There is every chance that the fires devastating our forests each summer will become increasingly frequent. It's a race against time to prepare local communities so they're ready to confront the infernos of the future.

programme.title: Les Mysteres De La Duchesse
programme.desc: Cyril is found murdered in his manor house. A year earlier, he had married the Duchess of Cremier, thirty years his senior. Maud Artuis investigates, with the unexpected help of a private detective employed by the duchess's daughter. What secrets has the family been hiding?

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 12
programme.desc: The chicken and the sparrowhawk live in perfect harmony. Until one day the village is struck by a terrible famine. With nothing left to eat, the sparrowhawk suggests to the chicken that they should eat their children in order to survive. The chicken accepts, but then hides her children.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 7
programme.desc: Champagne, Saint-emilion, the Loire Valley and Burgundy. In France today, four exceptional wine-growing regions have been awarded the prestigous title of world heritage sites. We explore these landscapes shaped by man...

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 4
programme.desc: Iceland, a small country lost in the cold waters of the Atlantic, just a few kilometres from the Arctic Circle. As well as glaciers, which are constantly monitored, the island also has 130 volcanoes, around thirty of which are active. Thanks to the locals, Sophie Jovillard discovers the complex relationship between the volcanoes and glaciers that make up Iceland.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: There are men on this planet who challenge death every day to feed their families. Between the desert and the Pacific Ocean, in the region of Huarmey in Peru, stand vertiginous cliffs. Men like Purunga must overcome them.

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: Many cities around the world dedicate insane amounts of space to parking. This cuts into space while housing is at a premium, encourages driving in cities, and heats up urban areas with massive swathes of blacktop. programme.title: Movie - Gajendra

programme.title: Movie - Aarya Surya
programme.desc: Arya and Surya, two struggling actors, put a smuggler behind bars. But the smuggler's boss chases them to seek revenge.

programme.title: Movie - Mannava
programme.desc: Nandini's father agrees to her marriage with Ishwar. When an astrologer predicts that Ishwar is going to kill someone in 45 days, her father postpones the marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Super Kudumbam

programme.title: Movie - Naangal

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.desc: Live match action from the latest match round of the Premier League, with insight, analysis, and reaction from our expert panel of studio guests.

programme.title: EXTRA TIME - MON 03 NOV (Live)
programme.desc: A look at a Premier League season through the eyes of a player who excelled that particular year. The highs and lows and everything in between, that made it a memorable and at times defining nine months for both the player and his club.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 12
programme.desc: Having originally joined Arsenal as a teenager in 2015, Donyell Malen's currently becoming a key figure in Unai Emery's Aston Villa side a decade later. Malen talks us through his journey that started in the Ajax academy, culminating in an Eredivisie title with PSV in 2018, following his brief stay in North London. He reflects on his time in the Bundesliga with Borussia Dortmund and making the 2024 Champions League final before his transfer to Aston Villa last January.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 22
programme.desc: We tell the story of a commanding centre-back whose leadership and consistency made him a standout figure in both the Premier League and international football. From his early career in Portugal to his influential spell at Southampton, PL Stories explores how Fonte became a rock in the heart of defence during the club's rise in the top-flight.

programme.title: REVIEW - TUE 04 NOV
programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 10, beginning with Saturday's clash between Tottenham Hotspur and Chelsea, moving on to Sunday's showdown of West Ham United against Newcastle United, and concluding with Monday's battle between Sunderland and Everton.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 8
programme.desc: We celebrate the unique legacy of footballing dynasties in the Premier League; where talent, passion, and pride are passed from one generation to the next. From the iconic saves of Peter Schmeichel to the rise of his son Kasper, the goal-scoring legacy of Ian Wright carried on by son's Shaun and Bradley, and the Lampards' deep-rooted Chelsea connection, this episode explores the bonds that tie football families together.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 12
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the interim Middleweight Championship as Garreth 'SoldierBoy' McLellan and Brendan 'Descendant' Lesar meet in the hexagon. Bonus coverage includes Matunga Djikasa vs. Ivan Strydom and Devon Cronje vs. Guy Mongambi.

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: This episode features Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his WBC Light Middleweight title against contender Alfonso Gomez, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr. challenging Miguel Cotto for his WBA super welterweight title in a bout which drew 1.5 million buys. Also on the card, action from former WBC Welterweight champ Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Aoiyama, Ishiura, Ikioi and Chiyonokuni from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features an interview with former UFC light heavyweight champion and true MMA legend, "The Phenom" Vitor Belfort. Bantamweight champion Dominick Cruz helps out with children's charities and feeding the hungry. Cage fighting veteran Frank Mir shows off his classic car and high tech hot rod collection and MMA legend Chuck Liddell unveils his life size wax statue.

programme.desc: This episode features Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his WBC Light Middleweight title against contender Alfonso Gomez, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr. challenging Miguel Cotto for his WBA super welterweight title in a bout which drew 1.5 million buys. Also on the card, action from former WBC Welterweight champ Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Aoiyama, Ishiura, Ikioi and Chiyonokuni from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features an interview with former UFC light heavyweight champion and true MMA legend, "The Phenom" Vitor Belfort. Bantamweight champion Dominick Cruz helps out with children's charities and feeding the hungry. Cage fighting veteran Frank Mir shows off his classic car and high tech hot rod collection and MMA legend Chuck Liddell unveils his life size wax statue.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the interim Middleweight Championship as Garreth 'SoldierBoy' McLellan and Brendan 'Descendant' Lesar meet in the hexagon. Bonus coverage includes Matunga Djikasa vs. Ivan Strydom and Devon Cronje vs. Guy Mongambi.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jermain Taylor vs. Jeff Lacy
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features former Middleweight Champion Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-2, 17 KOs) in a back and forth battle with Jeff "Left Hook' Lacy (24-1, 17 KOs) in a WBC Super Middleweight Title Eliminator on November 15, 2008 from the Vanderbilt University Memorial Gymnasium in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Bernard Hopkins facing off with Chad Dawson in a light heavyweight championship rematch from their controversial October 2011 bout. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 4 featuring Kakuryu, Shodai, Tochinoshin and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Gabriel Martinez vs. Serhiy Dzinziruk
programme.desc: This episode features a bout for the vacant WBC diamond middleweight title, as Sergio Gabriel 'Maravilla' Martinez (46-2, 25 KOs) takes on fellow southpaw Serhiy Dzinziruk, aka 'Dzyna Razor' (37-0. 24 KOs). This fight took place from Foxwoods Resort Casino in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA, on March 12, 2011. Martinez was the reigning Fighter of the Year coming into the fight and vacated his WBC Middleweight title in order to fight the undefeated former champion Dzinziruk.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Zip thinks Phoebe could be a superhero, so they craft some awesome superhero cuffs.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 47
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: Bluey can't wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 27
programme.desc: Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head to Alaska, America on a baby animal mission to help rescue some black bear cubs high up in a tree. Along the way, Andy meets a grumpy Arctic ground squirrel.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: It's the Woofton Wolves' last football match of the season and Rayane is in danger of missing the second half. Can hearing dog Diesel help him save the game?

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar drive through the baboons' enclosure and say hello to some very mischievous residents. They then meet the giant river otters at feeding time.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 24
programme.desc: In this special compilation episode, Squawk takes us on a journey to find Captain Captain's top Swashbuckle moments. We will see her silliest songs, most marvellous moments and messiest slops.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: King Tiger has met his perfect partner and he is getting married. It's going to be a royal wedding!! The squirrels are to be special Guests of Honour, but who is King Tiger marrying!?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: When the squirrels upset the mole by being noisy, Duggee suggests some team building.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 38

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 16
programme.desc: After a night of strong rain, the Shallots set sail on a seafaring adventure.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 40

programme.desc: Fifi and Fred help Stanley clear the park after a storm so it's ready for an Art Competition. The children use the recycled rubbish they found to make their pieces.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: The Kazoops decide to replace their broken couch, but Monty doesn't think being broken makes something useless.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 2

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 13
programme.desc: Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer and changes the rules back to only having one prize in the middle, but Bingo is forever losing.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: For her Father's Day card, Bluey sets out to draw a picture of herself and her father together. While recalling her favourite memories of playing with Bandit, Bluey struggles with the idea that her drawing must be perfect. Chilli tries to convince Bluey that perfection isn't easy, or absolutely necessary.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.desc: Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon with whisperings that someone is going on an adventure!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 42
programme.desc: Roly is trying to force a very large plastic ball into the bin, but it flies out and crashes into a tower that Betty has built.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Cucumber performing Cool Under Pressure while trying to not let any obstacle ruin her calm routine.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 40

programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to Botswana, Africa and embark on a baby animal mission to help a meerkat family move home. Along the way, Andy meets some zebra and must race across an enormous salt pan to escape a hungry jackal.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Charli and her disability assistance dog Tinks visit a Hobby Fair at Woofton Town Hall, where Charli is selling all the clever things she makes.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet a flightless bird called a cassowary. Then, they watch the Sunda gharial crocodilian being fed some fish and reveal an amazing connection they have with the cassowary.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 25
programme.desc: Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments.

programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels are tidying up - its Bring your Grandparents to Squirrel Club Day. Duggee has his Grandparents badge so he knows what they will like, a nice cup of tea.

programme.desc: King Tiger has met his perfect partner and he is getting married. It's going to be a royal wedding!! The squirrels are to be special Guests of Honour, but who is King Tiger marrying!?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: When the squirrels upset the mole by being noisy, Duggee suggests some team building.

programme.desc: Glitch hopes to win a solar-powered race across the Australian outback.

programme.desc: Glitch and his Glitchbots pretend to be the Go Jetters.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 10
programme.desc: Thomas is in Australia where racing car Ace is planning a big jump across lots of buses.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 16
programme.desc: After a night of strong rain, the Shallots set sail on a seafaring adventure.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 17
programme.desc: Cake decides to teach Sarah and Duck how to decorate with icing!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: Stanley needs to do some jobs for the community, but all his vehicles are out of power due to a cloud of butterflies obscuring them and he needs to figure out how to move them.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: It has snowed and almost no one can get about. Stanley builds a snow plough out of surf boards to clear the streets and makes a huge snow hill so that his friends can sledge down it.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: Monty is in a topsy-turvy mood and doing things a little bit differently, leaving him questioning why things always have to be same.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's time to check the weather forecast'. JoJo is determined to slide down the big slide at the park. But rainy weather forecast threatens her plans.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: For her Father's Day card, Bluey sets out to draw a picture of herself and her father together. While recalling her favourite memories of playing with Bandit, Bluey struggles with the idea that her drawing must be perfect. Chilli tries to convince Bluey that perfection isn't easy, or absolutely necessary.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 15

programme.desc: Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon with whisperings that someone is going on an adventure!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 16
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 17
programme.desc: Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Café in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 45

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 44

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 39
programme.desc: A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 9

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeard’s chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

But the last Knight to arrive back was so busy having fun that he forgot to bring back a present for the Queen. Noddy assures him the Queen won't mind but the poor Knight is adamant he must give her something. Noddy sets out to help him find the perfect gift.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: When the Pockets find an old treasure map, the Pirates are delighted. They race off to find the treasure. Only to come back rather confused. They found a treasure chest but it ran away! Noddy investigates: "What's happened to the Pirates' treasure?"

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: When one of Rupert's sneezes escapes the friends have to find it a home in the forest.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 - EP 8

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 33

On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops… "Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!!"… and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 34
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Flea didn't jump. Flea didn't really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea ‘Movement and activity!' and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 11

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 1
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 2
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 3
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 1
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 2
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 1
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 2
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: U.S. Markets Edition - EP 121
programme.desc: U.S. Markets Edition delivers key takeaways from the most impactful interviews and insights from CNBC’s programming in the US. As global markets become more interconnected, this program ensures audiences in Asia stay informed on major developments shaping the business world overnight.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 1
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 2
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe - EP 1
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Julianna Tatelbaum take on the most complex stories of the day with instant analysis on how you can make your money work around the news.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: US Squawk Box - EP 1
programme.desc: "Squawk Box" is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. programme.title: Child-Rearing Hints & Tips
programme.desc: Experts give advice to the questions and troubles from viewers about child-rearing.

programme.title: Gretel's Magical Oven
programme.desc: Each week, a particular sweet and its recipe will be introduced along with various topics about the sweet.

programme.title: French in a Happy Mood
programme.desc: Let’s learn simple and easy-to-remember phrases, looking at a modern Europe that cherishes its history and traditions while pursuing a lifestyle that fits its stature. Furthermore, we explore tips for "happiness" and various forms of "joy" through the unique European way of thinking and values behind their languages and lifestyles.

programme.title: Real-Life Travel English
programme.desc: This program is a practical listening course designed to help you understand fast-paced real English that you encounter when traveling abroad.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery (R)
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: With Mother (R)
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: See, Learn, Explore--A Deep Travelogue in Tohoku
programme.desc: Explore the unknown charms of the Tohoku region of northern Japan.

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Eps. 26 (R)
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: Time-Travel Sightseeing Train (R)
programme.desc: Leap through time and space aboard the futuristic time-travel sightseeing train! Inspired by the dog, he proposes a Shiba-themed magazine. Misfits are forced to collaborate, sparking friction and chaos. But through the dog’s gentle gaze, ideas emerge, and broken hearts begin to heal.

programme.title: Night Serial Drama "Hirayasumi" Eps. 2
programme.desc: A warm and bittersweet drama based on the internationally beloved manga by Shinzo Keigo. Ikuta Hiroto (Okayama Amane), 29, has no job, no romantic partner, and none of the usual worries about the future. Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.title: Hometown Stories

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Admired since ancient times for their beauty, Japanese swords are amazing works of art - this time, two naginata (polearms) associated with legendary warriors: Benkei and Tomoe Gozen.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kyoto in the autumn: the old capital is even more beautiful when dressed in autumn colours. Witness the contemplative and quiet beauty of Kyoto through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to mud. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along a 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japan - he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster and resilient people.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This series presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period - this episode spotlights ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's debut work 'The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei'.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Nakajima Hiromitsu makes supportive devices for world-class para-athletes such as gold medal-winning wheelchair tennis player Kamiji Yui - he talks about helping them perform at their best.

programme.title: DOSUKOI Sumo Salon
programme.desc: Only 7 per cent of rikishi make it to the top division - we learn what kind of special perks such top-division rikishi receive and hear how even some famous Yokozuna had inauspicious beginnings.

programme.title: The Musical Diplomat

programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest and most touching word in the world? "Mom"! Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

programme.title: You Are The Best! - EP 18
programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest and most touching word in the world? "Mom"! Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

programme.title: STAGE W for Chungnam
programme.desc: To commemorate "Chungnam Visit Year," Stage W will be held at Gwanghwamun Square, where global K-POP stars will perform.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies - EP 13
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family - one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar - EP 24
programme.desc: In this bold yet heartbreaking story, a mother and daughter-in-law meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Go Back - EP 6
programme.desc: Almost everyone wants to go back to the moment before making the most regrettable decision of their lives. The same goes for a married couple in this drama - their life-changing project is about to begin!

programme.title: Problem Child in House - EP 26
programme.desc: In a society that puts the spotlight on the smart guys, there are people who do not have a grain of common sense! In this knowledge-talk show, these people get locked up in a rooftop house and are allowed to go home only if they get 10 questions right!

programme.title: The Seasons W
programme.desc: When the end of one week meets the start of another week, this show will bring you music and stories that soothe your worries and concerns.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant - EP 293
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: Ride the Wind 2023 - EP 10
programme.desc: Experience the strength of international female solidarity as talented performers from diverse industries unite to showcase the beauty of Chinese culture and surpass their own limits in the highly anticipated season of Sisters.

programme.title: The Queen of News - EP 12
programme.desc: This fast-paced newsroom drama tells the story of SKN News' two prime-time anchors Sis Man and George facing off at every turn. The up-and-coming anchors are naturally embroiled into the tricky dynamics!

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 317
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Oh! My Queen - EP 87
programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! Delving into topics that resonate with everyone, each episode unfolds with lively discussions, injecting humor and joy into our daily lives, your go-to remedy for stress and a guaranteed laughter-inducing escape!

programme.title: Divas Hit the Road 7 - EP 7
programme.desc: Join Na Ying and a lively team of seven as they dive into a 25 day Silk Road trip filled with cultural encounters, heartfelt moments, and self-discovery, bringing Chinese culture to life on a global stage.

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 9
programme.desc: The story revolves around seven lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: Oh! My Queen - EP 87
programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. programme.title: Lo And Behold & What's On Today - EP 2676
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: Billionaire Story
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it’s the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Hot Door Night 23
programme.desc: Catch all the fun and laughter right here as we bring you Taiwan's top-grossing variety entertainment show that will keep you wanting for more!

programme.title: The Way To Happiness
programme.desc: The difference in values and gulf in life achievements of the Gao brothers result in conflicts and tension between their respective families.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne - EP 5
programme.desc: This drama narrates the power struggle within the traditionally male-preferred Qiu family. As the family patriarch falls ill and goes into a coma, the chairmanship shifts to his granddaughter Qiu Hao'er (Charmaine Sheh), sparking internal conflicts.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 89
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls ‘father’ is actually her real parents’ enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey…

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2073

programme.title: D.I.D. 12 - EP 25
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Miu-suet wants to wake Lok-fung up, but in vain. Siu-wan still carries out her plan so as to impose punishment for the last sin of “injustice”. At the scene, everyone is in danger of dying in an instant. Miu-suet eventually manages to recall Lok-fung’s main personality. But in the meantime, something collapses at the scene.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 7
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2073
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 4
programme.desc: Ho-yee buys Ko Tsun a meal. Chi-lam pretends to get into trouble as she coaxes Ko Tsun into saving her. Chi-tung takes on a case that involves some cleaner suing Yee-ting. Yee-ting asks Ko Tsun for help. Ho-yee, Chi-tung and Ko Tsun question the cleaner and find out Lai-kei aids and abets them. Ko Tsun asks Sau-yi to tell Yee-ting to resolve this matter by apologizing.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 5
programme.desc: Sau-yi tells the story of switching kids. Ko Tsun takes Inspector Lau to save Chi-tung. Ho-yee persuades Ko Tsun to draw the line between himself and Chi-lam. Chi-bun and Ka-pik recognize each other. Lai-kei becomes Y&N Business Director. Lai-kei runs into Apple, who invites Lai-kei to manage her artistes. And one of them is Lai-kei’s younger cousin sister.

programme.title: See Her Again - EP 8
programme.desc: A 90s Hong Kong's Serious Crimes Unit officer Yeung Kwong Yiu (William Chan) unexpectedly finds himself in 2018, where he meets his same-aged partner, Chan Hoi Ching (Cya Liu). They follow a series of elusive clues to investigate a long-unsolved serial murder.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: By means of the “brain wave analyzer”, Kwun-fung lets Kai-keung “describes” some incidents that took place thirty years ago. Kai-keung is a member of a distinguished family. He was in a political marriage, and his nasty wife mistreated him. Kai-keung then encountered investment fund manager Shan-shan.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Before the Tai Cho-fuk corruption case goes to trial, Kin Fung International Group Chairman Tai Cho-fuk wants to get off the hook, so he covertly plots to silence three key witnesses. RCU SIP Chow Chun-kit oversees a police operation code-named Eagle Nest with the aim the ensuring witness safety.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 6
programme.desc: Rewind six months, and Hon-yeung agonizes over the issue of the selection of a trustee. Meanwhile, Sau-yi manages to acquire a site in Singapore by submitting a tender that is way over the market price while keeping Hon-yeung in the dark. Ho-yee wants to renovate Diamond Plaza. But Sau-yi gets in her way.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 7
programme.desc: Apple wants to borrow money. Although Lai-kei is reluctant, but she has second thoughts as Apple mentions some old story. The bank is not making any concessions regarding the interest repayment period. Ho-yee resorts to agreeing to Sau-yi starting the casino project in exchange for Diamond Plaza development rights.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven - EP 3
programme.desc: A girl disappears from the world due to the Bobble Incident, and seven wicked people are involved in the incident. Who will be able to survive this bloody revenge?

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 19
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: There are cases involving bottles of sulfuric acid being thrown from heights. The perpetrator threateningly wants the culprit behind the “nanny vehicle terrorist case” to be released. Kwun-fung is invited to analyze the perpetrator’s approach. He helps OCTB solve the case. Wing-sze comes to the birds’ rescue on the ground.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 701-750) VVD Mandarin - EP 747
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2074
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 20
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] At the funeral of some officer who died in the line of duty, Ko Ho-yin takes Chow Chun-kit away and summons his wife Ho Tin-yu. During the interrogation, Chow Chun-kit alleges Ko Ho-yin doesn’t have sufficient evidence. Ko Ho-yin helplessly releases Mr and Mrs Chow.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 9
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2075
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 8
programme.desc: Ho-yee is not making up with Ko Tsun, who feels helpless. Chi-bun promises Sau-yan he will arrange for Lai-kei’s uncle to handle part of the hotel’s laundry business. Yee-ting throws a tantrum. After slogging away the whole night, Chi-bun and Hiu-ling complete the casino proposal. And then the bank abruptly stops lending money.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 9
programme.desc: Chi-tung discovers the truth and decides to keep quiet. Chi-lam and Ko Tsun meet up with Ho-yee and RIO. Ho-yee uses Diamond Plaza as collateral for borrowing money from Chiu Group. Apple asks Lai-kei to lend her money. Lai-kei declines. Apple then brings out some old photo as she wants to threaten Lai-kei.

programme.title: Birth of A Hero - EP 11
programme.desc: To avoid all the strife caused by the gangland power struggles, YUK WAN-LUNG (Edwin Siu) and his elder sister YUK KIU-FUNG (Rachel Kan) lead a quiet life, running an inn. Unexpectedly, WAN-LUNG is determined to take part in the New Hero Contest, seeking to win his ex, NGAI BING-BING (Roxanne Tong), back. After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: The Stamp of Love - EP 20
programme.desc: KIM (HEUNG HOI LAN, ANNE) is a Malaysian. She marries a Hong Kong man, WAN (LAU DAN), in order to improve her family’s living standard. When she arrives in Hong Kong, she is very confused. She accidentally knocks out a stranger, MAN (KWONG WA), in the street. On the wedding day, WAN suddenly dies from a heart attack, so Kim’s dream of staying in Hong Kong is destroyed. _x000D__x000D_ With the help of WAN’s tenant, she finds a job.

programme.title: The Beauty Of War - EP 16
programme.desc: Chung Ka-po (Jeannie Chan), Lam Siu-mei (Hera Chan) and Lee Ching-yee (Moon Lau) are sisterly buddies. Due to different reasons after graduation, the trio gradually go their separate ways. Ka-po is arbitrarily nominated by Siu-mei to participate in a school beauty contest organized by some magazine. Ka-po is eventually the unchallenged winner, and the Golden Agent Wing Yat-yin (Joel Chan) then convinces her to join his agency. Yat-yin encourages Ka-po to sign up for the Miss Hong Kong Pageant.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 5
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart - EP 65
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 1
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 1
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: The Beauty Of War - EP 17
programme.desc: Chung Ka-po (Jeannie Chan), Lam Siu-mei (Hera Chan) and Lee Ching-yee (Moon Lau) are sisterly buddies. Due to different reasons after graduation, the trio gradually go their separate ways. Ka-po is arbitrarily nominated by Siu-mei to participate in a school beauty contest organized by some magazine. Ka-po is eventually the unchallenged winner, and the Golden Agent Wing Yat-yin (Joel Chan) then convinces her to join his agency. Yat-yin encourages Ka-po to sign up for the Miss Hong Kong Pageant.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 6
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 2
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 3
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Birth of A Hero - EP 12
programme.desc: To avoid all the strife caused by the gangland power struggles, YUK WAN-LUNG (Edwin Siu) and his elder sister YUK KIU-FUNG (Rachel Kan) lead a quiet life, running an inn. Unexpectedly, WAN-LUNG is determined to take part in the New Hero Contest, seeking to win his ex, NGAI BING-BING (Roxanne Tong), back. After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

Ka-po is eventually the unchallenged winner, and the Golden Agent Wing Yat-yin (Joel Chan) then convinces her to join his agency. Yat-yin encourages Ka-po to sign up for the Miss Hong Kong Pageant.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 7
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land.
